relation2prompt.nationality: Please examine the provided paragraph and extract the nationalities of the people mentioned in the paragraph.
relation2prompt.place of death: Please identify relationships where "Location A is the place of death of Individual B" in the paragraph below.
relation2prompt.children: Please identify the "Person A is a child of Person B" relationships in the following paragraph.
relation2prompt.location contains: Please analyze the following paragraph to determine the hierarchical relationship between two geographical locations mentioned. Specifically, identify which location is broader and encompasses the other, more specific location.
relation2prompt.place of birth: Please analyze the birthplace connections in the following text. Identify the location where the individual was born.
relation2prompt.place lived: Please analyze the following text to identify any relationships indicating where an individual resided. Focus on phrases that suggest "Location X is where Individual Y lived or is currently living."
relation2prompt.company: Please identify the 'Individual X is the leader of Organization Y' relationships described in this paragraph.

nationality: Whether the Person has the Nationality
place of death: Whether the Person died in the Loccation
children: Whether the Parent has the Child
location contains: Whether the Broader Location contains the Specific Location
place of birth: Whether the Person was born in the Birth Place
place lived: Whether the Person has lived in the Location
company: Whether the Person owns or is the leader of the Company
